########## RESOURCES & CODES START HERE ##########
USE THESE CODES AT YOUR OWN RISK!, I am not responsible if any of these codes break your save, as a good practice I always make a backup of my save beforehand every time I apply a cheat.
 
########## DISCLAIMER ##########
The work put into the creation & maintainment of these codes & resources come from some of the following Discord Servers: 
Discord Server List: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources
The Author's listed above codes & the Creators & Maintainers

Spreadsheet for ID's: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16pNesZUCFnSW2UQq2DvmfdUQw-ZADhv_t9QkfzbE6sY/edit?pli=1&gid=1038103828#gid=1038103828
Credits to Skiler, Pj1980 for research.

[Skiller]
Characters - Template Builder
   - EXP -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
28000008 AAAAAAAA
   - Refill HP -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
2800000C AAAAAAAA
28000010 AAAAAAAA
   - HP -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000A0 AAAAAAAA
   - Refill EP -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
28000018 AAAAAAAA
2800001C AAAAAAAA
   - Refill CP -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
28000020 AAAAAAAA
28000024 AAAAAAAA
   - STR -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000A4 AAAAAAAA
   - DEF -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000A8 AAAAAAAA
   - ATS -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000AC AAAAAAAA
   - ADF -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000B0 AAAAAAAA
   - AGL -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000B4 AAAAAAAA
   - DEX -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000B8 AAAAAAAA
   - SPD -
95000000 CCCCCCCC
280000BC AAAAAAAA

Amount - Choose One [AA]
05F5E0FF - 99999999
000F423F - 999999
000003E7 - 999
000001F4 - 500
00000064 - 100
For Custom Value Refer To https://www.save-editor.com/tools/wse_hex.html
Notes: game stores values as Little Endian. 
however we write them as Big Endian as SW/Apollo will flip the byte order.

Set Individual Item Amount
10IIIIII 0000XXXX

Max Type Items
41IIIIII 0000XXXX
4CCC0004 00000000

Notes:
II = Item ID, Refer to spreadsheet
CCC = Count the amount of items you have of that "TYPE", ensure there are no other types between them in the list of the items.
otherwise you will need a new code (Max Type Items).
Values must be in Hex, Use: https://www.save-editor.com/tools/wse_hex.html

Example: Max All Recovery Items (99)
411BB4B4 00000063 <-- [1BB4B4] Item ID (II): Tear Balm | [63] x99 
400E0004 00000000 <-- [00E] Count (CCC): x14

Amount - Choose One [XX] (Most Cap at 99)
000A - 10
0032 - 50
0063 - 99
00FF - 255

[Skiller], [Anonymous/Discord Community]
Extra Id's & Or codes not fully explained
Source: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1v0AO3SG7EoKeA0lH_KNMryIiTuNsJxKKENvaPDVRw5o/edit?gid=216790735#gid=216790735
297980	Mira								
297984	G-Tokens								
297960	Earth								
297964	Water								
297968	Fire								
29796C	Wind								
297970	Time								
297974	Space								
297978	Mirage								
29797C	Sepith Mass								
42050	Connection Points								
42074	Sp Points		this is total sp but game seems auto correct in game						
42044	Law Alignment	48	if you have no points in a alignment you will need to add 40 after value as it's a flag						
42048	Grey Alignment	48	a type 2 code should work eg 20YYYYYY 400000XX						
4204C	Chaos Alignment	3C							
1C02D4	holo core exp	every 8h	max exp 30000	50 cores - refer to the code by Pj1980 (Max All Holo Core Exp)

Use code type 2 possible template for the above IDs?
20YYYYYY 400000XX
OR
20YYYYYY 000000XX

Depending if you have points in or not in alignment

XX = Value?	
48 = 72
3C = 60
Notes: try to figure it out in AM/Hex editor as there is not much info about these ID's
